description: This source file defines a ViewModel and a Composable function for the dashboard screen of a personal expense tracker app. The ViewModel fetches and exposes expenses data categorized by category, and the Composable renders the dashboard UI with expense data and summaries.

classes.name: DashboardViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel that retrieves expenses categorized data from the database and exposes it as a state flow for Compose.

methods.name: DashboardScreen
methods.description: Compose UI function that displays the expenses dashboard, including title, category breakdown, and expense totals.
